trans-unit.source: The entity type of the query.
trans-unit.target: 查询的实体类型。

trans-unit.source: Represents a typed query against a conceptual model in a given object context.
trans-unit.target: 表示在给定对象上下文中对概念模型的类型化查询。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> generic class represents a query that returns a collection of zero or more objects of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 泛型类表示一个查询，该查询返回由零个或多个特定类型的对象组成的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> must be defined before an object query can be executed.
trans-unit.target: 在执行对象查询之前，必须定义 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>。

trans-unit.source: This context provides the connection and metadata information that is required to compose and execute the query.
trans-unit.target: 此上下文提供了编写和执行查询所需的连接和元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: An object query is executed in the following scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 在以下方案中将执行对象查询：

trans-unit.source: When it is acted upon, such as during a `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 对其执行操作时，例如 `foreach` (C#) 或 `For Each` (Visual Basic) 枚举期间。

trans-unit.source: When it is assigned to fill a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> collection.
trans-unit.target: 分配用于填充 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> 集合时。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Execute%2A> method is explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 显式调用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Execute%2A> 方法时。

trans-unit.source: The query itself can be created by using an [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statement or a LINQ query, or it can be incrementally built by using the query builder methods included in the class.
trans-unit.target: 查询本身可以使用一个 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 语句或 LINQ 查询进行创建，也可以使用类中包含的查询生成器方法以增量方式生成。

trans-unit.source: In every case, the result is a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> instance that, when explicitly executed or enumerated over, will send the query to the data source for execution and return the results.
trans-unit.target: 在每种情况下，结果都为一个新 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 实例，该实例在显式执行或对其进行枚举时，会将查询发送到数据源进行执行并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> is frequently of an entity type, but it can also be of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> type, for projections to an anonymous type, or of a primitive type, such as an integer or string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 通常是实体类型，也可以是 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> 类型（用于匿名类型的投影）或基元类型（如整数或字符串）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example shows how to construct an instance of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何构造 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> can be initialized in such a way that it represents a single scalar result and not a collection of scalar results.
trans-unit.target: 可以对 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 进行初始化，使之表示单个标量结果而不是标量结果集合。

trans-unit.source: Some extension methods require collection results as input.
trans-unit.target: 某些扩展方法要求使用集合结果作为输入。

trans-unit.source: In this case, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown when one of these methods is called.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，当调用其中的一个方法时将引发 <xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。

trans-unit.source: When your application generates Entity SQL queries at runtime, you should be aware of any command length limitations of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当你的应用程序生成在运行时的 Entity SQL 查询时，你应注意的数据源的任何命令长度限制。

trans-unit.source: Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries.
trans-unit.target: Entity SQL 不会强制对查询中的命令文本的长度限制。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] query.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 查询。

trans-unit.target: 对其执行查询的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance using the specified [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] command as the initial query.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 命令为初始查询来创建新的 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 实例。

trans-unit.source: When your application generates Entity SQL queries at runtime, you should be aware of any command length limitations of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当你的应用程序生成在运行时的 Entity SQL 查询时，你应注意的数据源的任何命令长度限制。

trans-unit.source: Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries.
trans-unit.target: Entity SQL 不会强制对查询中的命令文本的长度限制。

trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example shows how to construct an instance of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何构造 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] query.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 查询。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> on which to execute the query.
trans-unit.target: 对其执行查询的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the entities that are retrieved through this query should be merged with the entities that have been returned from previous queries against the same <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定此查询所检索的实体应如何与以前对同一 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> 的查询所返回的实体合并。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance using the specified [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] command as the initial query and the specified merge option.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 命令（作为初始查询）和指定的合并选项创建新的 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 实例。

trans-unit.source: When your application generates Entity SQL queries at runtime, you should be aware of any command length limitations of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当你的应用程序生成在运行时的 Entity SQL 查询时，你应注意的数据源的任何命令长度限制。

trans-unit.source: Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries.
trans-unit.target: Entity SQL 不会强制对查询中的命令文本的长度限制。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> is initialized with the specified query, <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>, and <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 以指定的查询、<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 和 <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption> 进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Limits the query to unique results.
trans-unit.target: 将查询限制为唯一结果。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) applied.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于应用了 [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: This query builder method returns an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> instance that is equivalent to the original query with [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) applied.
trans-unit.target: 此查询生成器方法返回<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>等效于原始查询中使用的实例[SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md)应用。

trans-unit.source: The `DISTINCT` operator cannot be applied to an object that includes a mapping to a non-comparable column in the data source (such as ntext).
trans-unit.target: `DISTINCT`运算符不能应用于数据源 （如 ntext) 中包括到非相应的列的映射的对象。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.UnionAll%2A> method to create a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.UnionAll%2A> 方法创建新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Then it calls <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Distinct%2A> on the new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> object to get the unique results of this query.
trans-unit.target: 然后对新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Distinct%2A> 对象调用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>，以获取此查询的唯一结果。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> that represents the results to exclude from the query.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" />，表示要从查询中排除的结果。

trans-unit.source: Limits the query results by excluding results based on the results of another object query.
trans-unit.target: 通过根据另一个对象查询的结果排除结果的方式限制查询结果。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [EXCEPT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/except-entity-sql.md) applied based on the specified <paramref name="query" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于根据指定的 <paramref name="query" /> 应用了 [EXCEPT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/except-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: The supplied `query` that defines results to exclude must be of the same type or of a type that is compatible with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 提供`query`用于定义要排除必须结果与兼容类型的相同类型或<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>。

trans-unit.source: Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> instance.
trans-unit.target: 定义的参数中提供`query`与在中定义的参数合并<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>实例。

trans-unit.source: Parameters must be unique in the combined <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameterCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 参数在组合后的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameterCollection> 中必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 组合后的集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。

trans-unit.source: The resulting query inherits the connection from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> instance on which <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Except%2A> was called.
trans-unit.target: 生成的查询从 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 实例（调用了它的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Except%2A>）继承连接。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Except%2A> method to create a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> object and then iterates through the result of the new query.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Except%2A> 方法创建新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 对象，然后循环访问新查询的结果。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="query" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="query" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> to use when executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 要在执行查询时使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.AppendOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.AppendOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Executes the object query with the specified merge option.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合并选项执行对象查询。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectResult`1" /> that contains a collection of entity objects returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectResult`1" />，它包含查询返回的实体对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default merge option for object queries is <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.AppendOnly>.
trans-unit.target: 对象查询的默认合并选项为 <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.AppendOnly>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、 状态管理和更改跟踪](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example returns an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectResult%601> from <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例从 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectResult%601> 方法返回一个 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery.Execute%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results.
trans-unit.target: 然后，获取一个枚举器并循环访问查询结果。

trans-unit.source: At the end it releases the enumerator and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectResult%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 最后，释放枚举器和 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectResult%601> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The key columns by which to group the results.
trans-unit.target: 作为结果分组依据的键列。

trans-unit.source: The list of selected properties that defines the projection.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义投影的所选属性的列表。

trans-unit.source: Zero or more parameters that are used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法中使用的零个或多个参数。

trans-unit.source: Groups the query results by the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的条件对查询结果进行分组。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance of type <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord" /> that is equivalent to the original instance with [GROUP BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/group-by-entity-sql.md) applied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord" /> 类型的新 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于应用了 [GROUP BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/group-by-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.GroupBy%2A> applies the projection specified by the `projection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.GroupBy%2A> 将应用指定的映射`projection`参数。

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.GroupBy%2A> method is always of type <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 方法返回的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.GroupBy%2A> 始终具有类型 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> object that contains the results of the existing query grouped by product name.
trans-unit.target: 此示例创建一个新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 对象，该对象包含现有查询的按产品名称分组的结果。

trans-unit.source: This example returns a set of nested data records that contain the `Contact.LastName` column, grouped and sorted alphabetically by the first letter of `Contact.LastName`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将返回一组嵌套的数据记录包含`Contact.LastName`列、 分组和按字母顺序排序的第一个字母`Contact.LastName`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="query" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="query" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="projection" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="projection" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Dot-separated list of related objects to return in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 要在查询结果中返回的相关对象的列表（以点分隔）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the related objects to include in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 指定要包括在查询结果中的相关对象。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> with the defined query path.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" />，它具有定义的查询路径。

trans-unit.source: Query paths can be used with Entity SQL and LINQ queries.
trans-unit.target: 查询路径可以用于 Entity SQL 和 LINQ 查询。

trans-unit.source: Paths are all-inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 路径是完全内包含的。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an include call indicates `Include("Orders.OrderLines")`, not only will `OrderLines` be included, but also `Orders`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个包含调用指示`Include("Orders.OrderLines")`，不仅将`OrderLines`可以包括在内，而且也`Orders`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> method, the query path is only valid on the returned instance of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> 方法时，查询路径仅在 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 的返回实例上有效。

trans-unit.source: Other instances of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> and the object context itself are not affected.
trans-unit.target: 不影响 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 的其他实例和对象上下文本身。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> method returns the query object, you can call this method multiple times on an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> to specify multiple paths for the query, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 因为 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> 方法返回查询对象，所以可以对一个 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 多次调用此方法，从而为查询指定多个路径，如下面的示例所示：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="empty" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> that represents the results to include in the query.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" />，表示要包括在查询中的结果。

trans-unit.source: Limits the query results by including only the results that exist in another object query.
trans-unit.target: 通过仅包含另一个对象查询中存在的结果的方式限制查询结果。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [INTERSECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/intersect-entity-sql.md) applied based on the specified <paramref name="query" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于根据指定的 <paramref name="query" /> 应用了 [INTERSECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/intersect-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: The supplied `query` that defines results to include must be of the same type or of a type that is compatible with the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 提供`query`定义结果以包括必须是同一类型的或与兼容的类型<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>。

trans-unit.source: Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> instance.
trans-unit.target: 定义的参数中提供`query`与在中定义的参数合并<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>实例。

trans-unit.source: Parameters must be unique in the combined <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameterCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 参数在组合后的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameterCollection> 中必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 组合后的集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。

trans-unit.source: The resulting query inherits the connection from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> instance on which the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Intersect%2A> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 生成的查询从 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 实例（调用了它的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Intersect%2A> 方法）继承连接。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> object that contains the results of two other queries.
trans-unit.target: 此示例创建一个新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 对象，该对象包含两个其他查询的结果。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="query" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="query" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of this object query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此对象查询的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that is the name of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="string" /> 值，表示此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object query identifies the current object query in the sequence by name when constructing query builder methods.
trans-unit.target: 在构造查询生成器方法时，对象查询的名称按名称确定序列中的当前对象查询。

trans-unit.source: By default, the query name is `it`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，查询名称是`it`。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when referring to the current sequence in joins inside the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.Where*> method or in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.SelectValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: 在 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.Where*> 方法或 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.SelectValue*> 方法中引用联接中的当前序列时，这十分有用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Name%2A> property of an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>, that value becomes the alias in successive methods.
trans-unit.target: 当设置 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Name%2A> 的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 属性时，该值成为后续方法中的别名。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Name%2A> property must start with a letter and can contain letters, digits, and underscores.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Name%2A> 属性的值必须以字母开头，可以包含字母、数字和下划线。

trans-unit.source: This example sets the name of the first <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> to "product" and then uses this alias in the successive <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将第一个 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 的名称设置为“product”，然后在后续 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A> 方法中使用此别名。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The value specified on set is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 在集上指定的值无效。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectResult`1" /> returned when the query is executed with the applied filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用应用筛选器执行查询时，<see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectResult`1" /> 的类型返回。

trans-unit.source: Limits the query to only results of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 将查询限制为仅包括特定类型的结果。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [OFTYPE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/oftype-entity-sql.md) applied.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于应用了 [OFTYPE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/oftype-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.OfType*> is used to filter query results by a specific entity or complex type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.OfType*> 用于按特定实体或复杂类型筛选查询结果。

trans-unit.source: This supports a conceptual model with object inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 这样可支持具有对象继承的概念模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Entity Data Model: Inheritance](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/entity-data-model-inheritance.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[实体数据模型： 继承](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/entity-data-model-inheritance.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.OfType*> method can only be applied to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> of an entity type or complex type that is defined in the EDM.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.OfType*>方法只能应用于<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>的实体类型或复杂类型的 EDM 中定义。

trans-unit.source: The type specified is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的类型无效。

trans-unit.source: The key columns by which to order the results.
trans-unit.target: 作为结果排序依据的键列。

trans-unit.source: Zero or more parameters that are used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法中使用的零个或多个参数。

trans-unit.source: Orders the query results by the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 按指定条件对查询结果进行排序。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md) applied.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于应用了 [ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: The ordering of results in a nested query cannot be guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套查询中的结果排序无法得到保证。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A> should always be the final query builder method in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A> 应始终作为序列中最后一个查询生成器方法。

trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个新<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>对象，其中包含现有查询排序依据的结果`ProductID`。

trans-unit.target: 此方法中使用的零个或多个参数。

trans-unit.source: Limits the query results to only the properties that are defined in the specified projection.
trans-unit.target: 将查询结果限制为仅包含在指定投影中定义的属性。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance of type <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord" /> that is equivalent to the original instance with [SELECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) applied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord" /> 类型的新 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于应用了 [SELECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A> applies the projection specified by the `projection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A> 将应用指定的映射`projection`参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A> method is always a row type of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 方法返回的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A> 始终为行类型 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.SelectValue*> method to return values that are simple types, entity types, or complex types.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1.SelectValue*> 方法可返回简单类型、实体类型或复杂类型的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [LINQ to Entities](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/linq-to-entities.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[LINQ to Entities](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/linq-to-entities.md)。

trans-unit.source: When a navigation property is included in the projection, the query results include a collection of nested <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> objects.
trans-unit.target: 当投影中包括导航属性时，查询结果包括嵌套的 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用导航属性导航关系](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1d71c7d-16a7-4b46-96ac-690176bd5057)。

trans-unit.target: 在分析时应在作用域内的一组可选查询参数。

trans-unit.target: 将查询结果限制为仅包含投影中指定的属性。

trans-unit.target: 一个类型与特定投影兼容的新 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" />。

trans-unit.target: 返回的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 等效于应用了 [SELECT VALUE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Select%2A> 方法用于需要行类型（而不是值类型）的投影。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A> method cannot be used after the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A> 方法不能在 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> 方法之后使用。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> after <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A>, it functions like the [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) statement of an clause.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the results as a string.
trans-unit.target: 字符串形式的结果项数。

trans-unit.source: An optional set of query parameters that should be in scope when parsing.
trans-unit.target: 在分析时应在作用域内的一组可选查询参数。

trans-unit.source: Limits the query results to a specified number of items.
trans-unit.target: 将查询结果限制为指定的项数。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [TOP](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/top-entity-sql.md) applied.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于应用了 [TOP](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/top-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> is nondeterministic unless the query is sorted.
trans-unit.target: 除非对查询进行排序，否则 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> 具有不确定性。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> method after the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A> method, it functions like the [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) statement of an [ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md) clause.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A>方法之后<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A>方法，其工作方式像[限制](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md)的语句[ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md)子句。

trans-unit.source: These examples are based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 这些示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that contains the first two results of the existing query.
trans-unit.target: 此示例创建一个新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>，该对象包含现有查询的前两个结果。

trans-unit.source: This example gets five `Product` objects after skipping the first three in the query result, sorted by `Product.ListPrice`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将获取五个`Product`先跳过在查询结果中，按排序的前三个对象`Product.ListPrice`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> is used instead of [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) for paging.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> 而不是使用[限制](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md)进行分页。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> that represents the results to add.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" />，表示要添加的结果。

trans-unit.source: Combines the results of the query with the results of another object query, without any duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 将查询结果与另一个对象查询的结果进行组合（不包括重复项）。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [UNION](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) applied to add the results of the specified <paramref name="query" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于应用了 [UNION](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) 来添加指定 <paramref name="query" /> 的结果的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Union%2A> adds the results of the supplied `query` without any duplicates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Union%2A> 将所提供的结果添加`query`没有任何重复项。

trans-unit.source: The supplied `query` that defines the results to add must be of the same type or of a type that can be promoted to the type of this <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 提供`query`，它定义要添加必须的结果是相同类型或可以提升到此类型的类型<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following is valid because `DiscontinuedProducts` can be promoted to `Products`:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下是有效因为`DiscontinuedProducts`可以提升为`Products`:

trans-unit.source: The following will throw an exception because `Products` cannot be promoted to `DiscontinuedProducts`.
trans-unit.target: 以下将引发异常，因为`Products`不能提升为`DiscontinuedProducts`。

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> of type <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>, the records in both queries must have the same number of columns, and the types in the columns of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> of the passed `query` must be promotable to the types of the columns in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>类型的<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>，这两个查询中的记录必须具有相同数量的列和类型的列中<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>的传入`query`必须可提升为中的列的类型<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>的<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.

trans-unit.source: Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> instance.
trans-unit.target: 定义的参数中提供`query`与在中定义的参数合并<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>实例。

trans-unit.source: Parameters must be unique in the combined <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameterCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 参数在组合后的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameterCollection> 中必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 组合后的集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。

trans-unit.source: The resulting query inherits the connection from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> instance on which <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Union%2A> was called.
trans-unit.target: 生成的查询从 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 实例（调用了它的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Union%2A>）继承连接。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Union%2A> method to creates a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Union%2A> 方法创建新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.UnionAll%2A> method to create a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.UnionAll%2A> 方法创建新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Then it calls the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Distinct%2A> method on the new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> object to get the unique results of this query.
trans-unit.target: 然后对新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Distinct%2A> 对象调用 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 方法，以获取此查询的唯一结果。

trans-unit.target: 筛选谓词。

trans-unit.source: Zero or more parameters that are used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法中使用的零个或多个参数。

trans-unit.source: Limits the query to results that match specified filtering criteria.
trans-unit.target: 将查询限制为包含与指定筛选条件匹配的结果。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [WHERE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/where-entity-sql.md) applied.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1" /> 实例，等效于应用了 [WHERE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/where-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
trans-unit.target: 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that contains results of the existing query filtered by the following criteria: `"it.ProductID = 900"`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个新的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> 对象，该对象包含按条件 `"it.ProductID = 900"` 筛选的现有查询的结果。
